EU parliament to extend new medicine data protection to 7.5 years, document saysEU lawmakers have gone part of the way to meeting pharmaceutical industry concerns about the exclusivity period for new medicines after reaching a compromise on the biggest overhaul of EU pharmaceutical rules in 20 years, a parliament proposal showed. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 19:20:29 GMT EHYMBQQ2I5IVPFIEBBQY3YJOMM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-parliament-extend-new-medicine-data-protection-75-years-document-says-2024-03-13/Julia Payne世界欧洲
Zelenskiy's chief of staff discusses peace prospects and summit with Chinese ambassadorUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy's chief of staff met the Chinese ambassador to Kyiv on Wednesday and discussed a visit to Kyiv last week by a Chinese envoy and preparations for a world summit devoted to the two-year-old conflict with Russia. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 18:59:47 GMT ZFIPSQHKRVNF3IYUVPEJDOHTYY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiys-chief-staff-discusses-peace-prospects-summit-with-chinese-ambassador-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Campaign for jailed Senegal election candidate Faye takes to the roadBackers of detained opposition presidential candidate Bassirou Diomaye Faye are taking his campaign to the streets of Senegal with posters and bracelets, drumming up support in the hope he will be released before the vote. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 18:42:09 GMT FQLSSGYVLVLA3PUHXKNTX3LQB4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/campaign-jailed-senegal-election-candidate-faye-takes-road-2024-03-13/Reuters世界非洲
Austria expels two Russian diplomats for actions 'incompatible with status'Austria has declared two diplomats from the Russian embassy personae non gratae for actions "incompatible with their diplomatic status," ordering them to leave the country within a week, Austria's Foreign Ministry said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 18:17:26 GMT QNKEPS2UG5OVTNFJFIIB5PQMCA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/austria-expels-two- Russian-diplomats-bilingual-embassy-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Several staff of barred Russian anti-war candidate arrested ahead of electionSeveral campaign staffers and volunteers for disqualified Russian presidential candidate Boris Nadezhdin have been arrested in what he cast as an attempt by authorities to thwart efforts to monitor the presidential election later this week. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 18:12:58 GMT 3OBVNE43I5JKZPF3HEODZYWDPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/several-staff-barred- Russian-anti-war-candidate-arrested-ahead-election-2024-03-13/Lucy Papachristou世界欧洲
Dutch politician Wilders says he is ready to forego job of prime ministerDutch politician Geert Wilders said on Wednesday he was ready to forego the job of prime minister in an effort to facilitate the formation of a new right-wing government, nearly four months after an election in which his party won most votes. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:48:39 GMT 4DZNB35BCBN6XOOYDJKEWLSGLM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-politician-wilders-ready-forego-pm-job-says-broadcaster-2024-03-13/Toby Sterling世界欧洲
Italy rejects extradition to Israel of Palestinian over rights fearsAn Italian appeals court refused on Wednesday to send a suspected Palestinian militant to Israel, saying he risked "cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment" if he was extradited. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:39:26 GMT 5DITLOADWZI2TPZ7JKMZTUB7JM https://www.reuters.com/world/italy-rejects-extradition-israel-palestinian-over-rights-fears-2024-03-13/Reuters世界
Spain arrests 14 accused of defrauding families of missing migrantsSpain's Civil Guard has arrested 14 people for allegedly seeking to profit from the families of missing migrants from North Africa, promising them to find, identify and repatriate their bodies in return for money, it said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:33:43 GMT P2I3554QOVOAJCN5D2TNXPK4X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-arrests-14-accused-defrauding-families-missing-migrants-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
EU agrees 5 bln euro boost for Ukraine military aid fundEuropean Union countries agreed on Wednesday to provide 5 billion euros ($5.48 billion) for military aid to Ukraine as part of a revamp of an EU-run assistance fund, handing Kyiv a timely boost as its forces struggle against Russia's invasion. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:21:08 GMT MQAADROFOJKVTBBTYEFCVQ4E4A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-agrees-5-bln-euro-boost-ukraine-military-aid-fund-2024-03-13/Andrew Gray世界欧洲
IMF intends to pick next managing director by end-April, board saysThe International Monetary Fund has begun the process of selecting its next managing director and intends to choose a candidate by the end of April, the global lender's executive board said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 17:10:31 GMT PU4EJFUQQZNQPF6TBGZCMZXVOY https://www.reuters.com/world/imf-intends-pick-next-managing-director-by-end-april-board-says-2024-03-13/Reuters世界
Spain's Catalonia calls early election on eve of amnesty voteSpain's Catalonia region will hold an early election on May 12 after the regional parliament rejected the separatist minority government's budget proposal, Catalan government head Pere Aragones said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 16:28:58 GMT V3CIJ7JDSBPLVEQX5F44P2XJSI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spains-catalonia-calls-snap-election-regional-budget-rejected-2024-03-13/Joan Faus世界欧洲
